### [choco://google-workspace-sync](choco://google-workspace-sync)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)

---

## What is GWSMO?

If your organization has switched to a Google Account but you'd like to keep using Microsoft Outlook, you can use GWSMO. GWSMO is a plugin that synchronizes your mail, calendar events, contacts, notes, and tasks between your new Google Account and Outlook.


#### System requirements: 
* Requires G Suite, G Suite for Education, or G Suite for Government
* Windows Vista (32 bit) SP1 
* Windows Vista (64 bit) SP1 
* Windows 7 (32 and 64 bit) 
* Windows 8 (32 and 64 bit) 
* Windows 10 (32 and 64 bit)
* Microsoft Outlook 2003® SP3 
* Microsoft Outlook 2007® SP2 (or SP1 with hotfix) 
* Microsoft Outlook 2010® (32 and 64 bit) 
* Microsoft Outlook 2013® (32 and 64 bit) 
* Microsoft Outlook 2016® (32 and 64 bit)	
* Microsoft Outlook 2019® (32 and 64 bit)	
---
displayName: Google Workspace Sync for Microsoft Outlook® (GWSMO) (Install)
summary: GWSMO - a tool to migrate your Outlook data to G Suite.
author: Google
